description:
After the coronation ceremony for the new king Rumaty had taken place, Zao was waiting to talk to Lee-Leng. Zao asks Lee-Leng to take back stepping down as the leader of the Huang’s, but Lee-Leng’s mind is made up in order to protect Kajika. Zao, having put all his hopes and dreams of the Huang’s into Lee-Leng’s hand, turns to his last resort. After some time had passed, Kajika finds out that Lee-Leng had gone back home. With some discomfort and anxiety, Kajika returns to the United States to find out that Lee-Leng and Ling-Lee are now engaged. Kajika becomes confused and in addition to that, news of Machaty’s critical condition is relayed to her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Relying on the Course of Love
